title: Natural Language Processing to Extract Head and Neck Cancer Data from Unstructured Electronic Health Records
details: T Young, JA Yeung, K Sambasivan, D Adjogatse… - Clinical Oncology, 2025
abstract: Background Patient data is frequently stored as unstructured data within Electronic Health Records (EHRs), requiring manual curation. AI tools using Natural Language Processing (NLP) may rapidly curate accurate real-world unstructured EHRs to …
